attributes.action: Bring them Back: Greek heritage out of British Museums
attributes.additional_details:
http://bringthemback.org/

This petition calls upon the DCMS to return all objects of Greek heritage taken by Lord Elgin and other British officials to the Greek people; the theft of Greek heritage by British officials is an act of violation which the British people should not tolerate

rejection.details: This is a matter for the museums concerned.
